name: RogueZilla (LD38)
description:
Find a place to stay...

It’s hard to hide when the world appears small! Help G’zilla on the journey to find the perfect hiding place forever in this Ludum Dare 38 entry! 

This is a side-scrolling platform shooter sort of deal, where you play as the giant monster G'zilla! You have to avoid search helicopters by hiding behind telecom towers, and billboards. And if you're detected you better prepare to tackle the military strike that follows!

Controls

InputActionAMove LeftDMove RightWHide (Behind tall objects)SHide (Duck behind billboards)Mouse CursorAim*Mouse LeftFire BreathMouse RightLaser Eyes

*There are two cursors, one yellow and one that is blue and purple, each corresponds to the two different weapons.

Hint: The tail. Oh, the tail. It is so OP. Use it. 

Music provided by Erik Schröder !
